infos.info: Hickerson reports that the program ';started 8/14/339 on WLW, Cincinnati.'; - ----------------------------------------------- - Lackmann reports that the program was broadcast - 1. on Mutual, 1935-1937, at 11:30am - 2. on NBC Red, 1933-1934, at 3:00pm and other years on NBC Red and NBC at 3:15pm - 3. on NBC Blue at 10:15am - 4. on CBS, 1938-1939, at 2:00pm and other years at 1:15pm.
